title: South of France
brief_description: A practical guide for people intending to travel the South of France. Host John Guerassio begins in the Provence region, visiting Avignon, Arles, Camarge, Stes-Maries-De-La-Mer, Vaucluse, and Gard. From here he travels to the French Riviera to appraise Nice, Cannes, Mougins, St Paul, Biot, St Raphael, St Tropez and Pramousquier. He recommends quiet and remote beaches in the region for those wishing to escape the crowds. Provides advice on public transport options, budget and deluxe hotels, money saving tips, food and wine. Includes shopping advice for antiques, lace and hand blown glass.
